The game is a common tic tac toe game.

 It is a strategic game for two players, who take turns to mark the grid 
with either a cross or a nought. The winner is the player who is able to place 
three of theirs marks in a horizontal, vertical or diagonal row. 

Click upon the one of the 9 boxes. Player 1 is X and Player 1 is O.

		

HAVE FUN!!
